Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will be played at the Major Antônio Couto Pereira Stadium in the city of Curitiba (Brazil)
The stadium is where the Coritiba Foot Ball Club plays its home matches, was built in 1932 and has a capacity for approximately 40,400 spectators
